title: American Flyers Movie - 1985 Cycling
description:
Sports physician Marcus (Kevin Costner) convinces his estranged brother David (David Marshall Grant) to train and compete in a long-distance bicycle race across the Colorado Rockies. 

Family friction and a deadly medical condition inherited from the men&#039;s father complicate their relationship during the rigorous training. 

Director John Badham captures the breathtaking mountain scenery while giving insight into the tactics of bike racing.
